product_name: Black Diamond Prodigy Gloves - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: No matter what Mother Nature hucks down on you on the ski hill, the waterproof, insulated Black Diamond Prodigy gloves for women provide the required protection and warmth to keep you out there. Waterproof, highly breathable Gore-Tex(R) XCR(R) inserts keep your hands dependably dry and comfortable. Woven nylon four-way stretch shells are highly abrasion resistant. Removable liners are insulated with 284g PrimaLoft One, a patented ultrafine microfiber blend that offers downlike softness, and is incredibly lightweight and water repellent. Goat leather at the palms stands up to the stress of mountain adventures; leather provides good grip of ski poles and other equipment. Black Diamond Prodigy gloves have molded EVA foam padding on the knuckles that adds warmth while also protecting your hands from impacts. Closeout.
